name: Blouzar
overview:
Blouzar (interactive entertainment) is an on-line entertainment company whom create and develop virtual g-coms. G-coms (Games based on real life genres and communities) are quickly becoming the entertainment of choice on the web. A g-com places equal importance on both the ‘game’ and ‘genre/community e/g fashion, football, music’ aspects of the site. They are not only games (e.g World of Warcraft), and they are not only communities (e.g Facebook). They are both.

Here at Blouzar we think the internet is still playing second fiddle to TV. When it comes to entertainment the TV is boss. We aim to change that. Do you use the net? You probably read your e-mails, check the news and Google a recipe. And that is about it. Well we are doing our part in bringing about the downfall of the TV. The net is the place to be. We want people to feel good when they log in. Hence our strapline ‘log in â€“ feel famous’.

Blouzar ltd. currently operates the worlds largest virtual fashion g-com, ‘Miss Bimbo’. Miss Bimbo is a large g-com of fashion conscious girls and women. Miss Bimbo G-comers enjoy shopping for their virtual ‘bimbo’, making friends as well as entering fashion contests and chatting in the forums about all things female. Please take your time and enjoy checking out our website to learn more about Blouzar ltd.
